data.text: Crankbrothers Candy and Eggbeater: Your Choice?

Crankbrothers Candy and Eggbeater users, what are your thoughts on both of these pedals? I've been running the Candy for a while and I'm thinking about switching to pair of Eggbeater. I tried clipping into my friend's and didn't feel it was more difficult than the Candy. My concern would be the lack of platform on the Eggbeater, which can potentially lead to less power transfer and foot fatigue? I do wear a pair of stiff XC race shoes. Thanks in advance!
